bonus.value: Upon switching to the weapon, gain 50%/62.5%/75% damage reflection for 3 seconds. Cooldown: 30 seconds. Upon switching to another weapon, gain a 20%/25%/30% damage boost for 5 seconds. Cooldown: 30 seconds.

mind.name: Power Play
mind.desc: The two heads usually fight over who gets to kill the prey. A little instigation and the fight turns physical.

memory.name: Divided Land
memory.desc: Where was it from? Maybe it still somewhat knows.

belief.name: Natural Aggression
belief.desc: It never gets tired of the eternal biting and grinding, always eagerly awaits the next victim.

emotion.name: Intimidating Roar
emotion.desc: It starts with a roarâ€”that is also the death knell for the innocent victims.
